subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer rallied to win the Fields Open in Kapolei, Hawaii, for her fifth L.P.G.A. Tour title, making birdies on four of the final five holes for a one-stroke victory over Jeong Jang of South Korea. Creamer closed with a bogey-free six-under-par 66.
